forwardTimeEvolution

public double forwardTimeEvolution(int x,
                                   int y,
                                   double t)
The probability of ending in state y after time t, conditional on starting in state x, according to the forward evolution matrix.

Parameters:
x - starting state
y - end state
t - elapsed time
Returns:
probability of starting from state x and ending in state y after time t.

backwardTimeEvolution

public double backwardTimeEvolution(int x,
                                    int y,
                                    double t)
The probability of ending in state y after time t, conditional on starting in state x, according to the backward evolution matrix.

Parameters:
x - starting state (child)
y - end state (parent)
t - elapsed time (backwards in time)
Returns:
probability of starting from state x and ending in state y after time t.

public double[] getEquilibrium()
Returns:
equilibrium distribution
